thread.title: Nawazuddin Siddiqui: Our cinema's no less than world cinema
thread.title_full: Nawazuddin Siddiqui: Our cinema's no less than world cinema - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Nawazuddin Siddiqui: Our cinema's no less than world cinema
text:
Actor Nawazuddin Siddiqui, known for his strong performances in Bollywood films like "Gangs of Wasseypur 2", "Kick", and " Bajrangi Bhaijaan ", says the quality of Indian movies is as good as any world cinema.*Nawazuddin Siddiqui*
"Our cinema...that we are making, is no less than any world cinema. We are making good films and ... Â»
